long_description:
# End Portal Buckets for MineClone2
Adds an easy way to access the end from anywhere by carrying an placeable end portal in a bucket.
## Credits
* Code - PrairieWind
* Textures - FossFanatic
## Licenses
* Code - MIT
* Texture(s) - CC BY-SA 4.0
name: mcl_end_portal_bucket
short_description: Adds an easy way to carry the end portal where ever you go in MineClone2.
title: End Portal Buckets for MineClone 2
